SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SET NOCOUNT ON /********************************************************************/ /* 로컬박스별 광고 플레이 로그 - T_AD_PLAY_LOG 조회 - GetAdPlayLogList */ /***************************************************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED DECLARE @PAGE INT = {0} ,@PAGE_COUNT INT = {1}; WITH T_TABLE AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {2}) ROW_IDX , A.IDX , A.REG_DATE , A.DEVICE_KIND , CM.NAME AS DEVICE_KIND_NAME , A.DEVICE_CODE , A.AD_CODE , B.TITLE , C.DEVICE_NAME , A.PLAY_TIME , A.REMARK , A.INSERT_CODE , D.USER_NAME AS INSERT_NAME , CM2.NAME AS BANNER_TYPE2_NAME FROM T_AD_PLAY_LOG A INNER JOIN T_AD B ON A.AD_CODE = B.AD_CODE INNER JOIN T_COMMON CM ON CM.MAIN_CODE = 'L003' AND CM.SUB_CODE = A.DEVICE_KIND LEFT JOIN T_DEVICE C ON A.DEVICE_CODE = C.DEVICE_CODE INNER JOIN T_MEMBER D ON A.INSERT_CODE = D.MEMBER_CODE INNER JOIN T_COMMON CM2 ON CM2.MAIN_CODE = 'A010' AND CM2.SUB_CODE = B.BANNER_TYPE2
WHERE 1=1 #[FR_DATE] #[TO_DATE] #[DEVICE_KIND] #[AD_CODE] #[DEVICE_CODE] #[TITLE] #[DEVICE_NAME] ) SELECT * ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_TABLE) AS TOTAL_ROWCOUNT FROM T_TABLE WHERE ROW_IDX > (@PAGE -1) * @PAGE_COUNT AND ROW_IDX <= @PAGE * @PAGE_COUNT SET NOCOUNT OFF
